items.title: Refresh your countertops for 2026 with this Ninja French Door Premier 10-in-1 oven while at its $200 low (Reg. $280)
items.summary:
Amazon is offering the Ninja French Door Premier 10-in-1 Countertop Oven at $199.95 shipped, which matches the price we’re seeing directly from the brand’s website. Coming down from a $280 tag, this newer appliance first dropped to this rate during Black Friday and rode the savings train all the way through Cyber Monday and a majority of December. Now, you’re getting another shot at the lowest price we have tracked, thanks to the $80 markdown. You can check out more of this popular brand’s appliance deals in its Amazon storefront here.

Buy for $13 $12 (Reg. $40)

What we love

It’s hard to argue against the value here at just $13 $12 – especially for a charger that’s so easy to use and take with you. The PowerCord may not be for everyone, but its all-in-one design makes it more useful than you might expect. And like other Twelve South gear, it offers solid build quality overall.

items.title: Gift an elegant splash of colorful décor for Valentine’s Day with LEGO’s brick-built Love sculpture at $64
items.summary:
LEGO Art Love set

Buy for $64 (Reg. $80)

What we love

Stacking up to 791 total pieces and coming as a great option to gift to your loved ones this coming Valentine’s Day, this brick-built recreation of the famous LOVE series of sculptures brings some elegant décor to any space it’s placed. It’s not just some small addition either, as it stands 10 inches high, 10 inches wide, and 2.5 inches deep – plus, there’s some nice vibrant color here that not only compliments each other, but also your space without overwhelming certain aesthetics.

items.title: Brazil orders Meta to suspend policy banning third-party AI chatbots from WhatsApp
items.summary: Brazil's competition watchdog has ordered WhatsApp to put on hold its policy that bars third-party AI companies from using its business API to offer chatbots on the app. The agency has also started an investigation against the company to determine if the policy is anti-competitive.
